definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: After studying English ( Afier he studied English), he got a small job at film studio.
sentences.chinese: 学习英语之后，他在一家电影制片厂找了一份小工。

sentences.english: But Pinewood hopes to break this on Saturday with the Tom Cruise film, which was made at the site in the 1990s.
sentences.chinese: 但是松林制片厂希望在周六打破这个记录。

sentences.english: The head of the studio always hated my guts and now he's paying me off.
sentences.chinese: 制片厂的头一直恨我入骨，现在他要发清工资解雇我。

sentences.english: Now it appears it has a studio that will get it into theaters.
sentences.chinese: 现在看来已经有制片厂愿意把它推广到院线。

sentences.english: The production unit of the Beijing Film Studio will leave Beijing for other parts of the country to film the exterior next month.
sentences.chinese: 北京电影制片厂摄制组下个月去外地拍外景。

sentences.english: Beijing Film Studio 80's former Deputy Factory Manager.
sentences.chinese: 80年代曾任北京电影制片厂副厂长。

sentences.english: Hollywood has a laissez-passer to China's first foundry of filmmaking.
sentences.chinese: 好莱坞拥有一张通往中国首个电影制片厂的通行证。

sentences.english: Shepperton Studios, London, on a bleak December day.
sentences.chinese: 谢伯顿制片厂，伦敦，十二月寒风刺骨的一天。

sentences.english: The movie 'Artist Zhu Qizhan' was completed by Shanghai Animation Film Studio.
sentences.chinese: 电影《画家朱屺瞻》由上海美术电影制片厂摄制完成。

sentences.english: An animated cartoon made by Shanghai Animation Film Studio in 1983.
sentences.chinese: 上海美术电影制片厂83年小时候的片子。

sentences.english: Miao Yue, female, is a first-class director of China.
sentences.chinese: 苗月，女，峨眉电影制片厂国家一级导演。

sentences.english: Many movie studios wanted to buy the exclusive rights to the story.
sentences.chinese: 很多电影制片厂想要买下这个故事的独占权。

sentences.english: Wang Bing has just started working at a film studio.
sentences.chinese: 王冰刚刚开始在电影制片厂里工作。

sentences.english: At Changchun, you will visit the Movie Studio and the Pure Moon Pool park.
sentences.chinese: 先在长春参观电影制片厂和净月潭公园。

sentences.english: In Hollywood, no one dare to tell you which picture will make money for studios.
sentences.chinese: 在好莱坞，没人敢告诉你哪部片能让制片厂赚大钱。
制片厂觉得那样太“消极。

definition: theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
Disney (company name, surname)/Walt Disney (1901-1966), American animator and film producer
Time Warner Inc., US media company
to start shooting (a film)/to invest in (a movie)/to put (sth) up for auction
